overview:
Arvind has been at the forefront of monetizing web based businesses since the early days at Netscape. He has a strong background in developing applications, platforms and services across a number of technologies. He joined Stayhealthy as CTO from the financial services company, Greendot, where he was VP, Interactive, managing the web and mobile properties. Previously, he was at social media company MySpace, where he was VP, Data Platform during a period of tremendous change. Prior to that, Arvind was CTO of Buzznet and was responsible for managing multiple, scalable web properties during a period of rapid growth.

Arvind has a proven track record in technology, holding leadership positions at Yahoo, Earthlink, Los Angeles Times and Oracle. He is an active blogger and is also a holder of 3 US Patents.

Arvind is a graduate of the dual-degree Jerome Fisher Management and Technology program at the University of Pennsylvania with a B.S. degree in Computer Science and Engineering and B.S. Degree in Finance from the Wharton School of Business.
